mapper.select: select * from nx_customer_user_goods where nx_CUG_user_id = #{nxCugUserId} and nx_CUG_community_goods_id = #{nxOsCommunityGoodsId}

select *, huaxianCos.nx_community_orders_sub_id 'huaxianCos_nx_community_orders_sub_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_service 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_service', huaxianCos.nx_COS_service_date 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_service_date', huaxianCos.nx_COS_service_time 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_service_time', huaxianCos.nx_COS_goods_index 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_goods_index', huaxianCos.nx_COS_community_goods_id 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_community_goods_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_order_user_id 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_order_user_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_status 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_status', huaxianCos.nx_COS_type 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_type', huaxianCos.nx_COS_orders_id 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_orders_id', huaxianCos.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_huaxian_different_price', huaxianCos.nx_COS_huaxian_price 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_huaxian_price', huaxianCos.nx_COS_price 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_price', huaxianCos.nx_COS_quantity 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_quantity', huaxianCos.nx_COS_subtotal 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_subtotal', huaxianCos.nx_COS_remark 'huaxianCos_nx_COS_remark',
ncosRemark.nx_community_orders_sub_id 'ncosRemark_nx_community_orders_sub_id', ncosRemark.nx_COS_service 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_service', ncosRemark.nx_COS_service_date 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_service_date', ncosRemark.nx_COS_service_time 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_service_time', ncosRemark.nx_COS_goods_index 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_goods_index', ncosRemark.nx_COS_community_goods_id 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_community_goods_id', ncosRemark.nx_COS_order_user_id 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_order_user_id', ncosRemark.nx_COS_status 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_status', ncosRemark.nx_COS_type 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_type', ncosRemark.nx_COS_orders_id 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_orders_id', ncosRemark.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_huaxian_different_price', ncosRemark.nx_COS_huaxian_price 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_huaxian_price', ncosRemark.nx_COS_price 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_price', ncosRemark.nx_COS_quantity 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_quantity', ncosRemark.nx_COS_subtotal 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_subtotal', ncosRemark.nx_COS_remark 'ncosRemark_nx_COS_remark',
huaxianCosRemark.nx_community_orders_sub_id 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_community_orders_sub_id', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_service 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_service', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_service_date 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_service_date', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_service_time 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_service_time', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_goods_index 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_goods_index', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_community_goods_id 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_community_goods_id', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_order_user_id 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_order_user_id', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_status 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_status', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_type 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_type', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_orders_id 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_orders_id', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_huaxian_different_price', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_huaxian_price 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_huaxian_price', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_price 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_price', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_quantity 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_quantity', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_subtotal 'huaxianCosRemark_nxv_COS_subtotal', huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_remark 'huaxianCosRemark_nx_COS_remark' from nx_community_goods as ncg
left join nx_community_card as ncc on ncc.nx_community_card_id = ncg.nx_cg_card_id
left join nx_community_orders_sub as ncos on ncos.nx_COS_community_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id and ncos.nx_COS_order_user_id = #{userId} and ncos.nx_COS_status = -1 and ncos.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price = 0 and ncos.nx_COS_type = 0 left join nx_community_orders_sub as huaxianCos on huaxianCos.nx_COS_community_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id and huaxianCos.nx_COS_order_user_id = #{userId} and huaxianCos.nx_COS_status = -1 and huaxianCos.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price > 0 and huaxianCos.nx_COS_type = 0
left join nx_community_orders_sub as ncosRemark on ncosRemark.nx_COS_community_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id and ncosRemark.nx_COS_order_user_id = #{userId} and ncosRemark.nx_COS_status = -1 and ncosRemark.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price = 0 and ncosRemark.nx_COS_type = 0 left join nx_community_orders_sub as huaxianCosRemark on huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_community_goods_id = ncg.nx_community_goods_id and huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_order_user_id = #{userId} and huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_status = -1 and huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_huaxian_different_price > 0 and huaxianCosRemark.nx_COS_type = 0
and nx_cg_community_id = #{commId}
and nx_cg_goods_name like concat('%', #{searchStr}, '%')
mapper.delete:
delete from nx_customer_user_goods where nx_CUG_goods_id in
#{nxCugGoodsId}
